name: Deadeye Dungeon
description: Shoot monsters and discover dark secrets in a relentless new VR experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better) Storage: 2.36 GB available space
